column5: I decided to make a ice rod box to bolt behind the 2-up seat on my atv last weekend. Here's the semi-finished project. I still have a few minor things to do yet. It'll hold 4 rods and some other small gear. The reason I built it was because I purchased a few longer rods this year ( 36" & 42" ) and I knew they wouldn't fit in my portable huts the way I wanted them to.  Colin
I am always fascinated by the ingenuity of the members here.
I need to make something like this for my sled.  But it's gotta hold my rods, my finder and my auger
Nice work Colin!  I have some mods to do to the old polaris soon too. Just have to wait till the river freezes and I get some free time before Simcoe freezes!
...a few slight modifications and you'd be good to go Bill!
